familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $1,001 - $2,500 in (income type not disclosed) income from PIMCO ENHANCED SHORT MAT ACTIVE ETF (MINT) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser. Shares of this asset were sold, but later re-purchased.
familyMemberEthics.business: Pimco Enhanced Short Mat Active ETF (Mint)

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $2,501 - $5,000 in (income type not disclosed) income from PIMCO RAE FUNDAMENTAL ADVANTAGE PLUS FUND CLASS P (PFATX) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Pimco Rae Fundamental Advantage Plus Fund Class P (Pfatx)

familyMemberEthics.description: Ivanka Trump received $1,001 - $2,500 in (income type not disclosed) income from PIMCO TOTAL RETURN FUND CLASS P (PTTPX) the year before her appointment as her father's presidential adviser.
familyMemberEthics.business: Pimco Total Return Fund Class P (PTTPX)

familyMemberEthics.description: Jared Kushner received $1,001 - $2,500 in (income type not disclosed) income from PIMCO ENHANCED SHORT MAT ACTIVE ETF (MINT) the year before his appointment as Pres. Trump's senior adviser. This asset has been divested.
familyMemberEthics.business: Pimco Enhanced Short Mat Active ETF (Mint)
